page.title: 05THE OLD CHURCH
page.content: The Old Church was founded around the 12th century. Llandrindod-the Church of Trinity was before 1400 called Llandduw-the church of God.Until the 18th century much of the history was a mystery . By 1830 the towns fortunes were already recovering and the first Pump House was built.Doubt remains whether the little church shared in the prosperity which the rich visitors brought to the town for the condition of the church was generally poor and uncared for. The Old Church and Cefnllys Church were no longer adequate in size and and location,to meet the demands of a growing population and increasing numbers of visitors.This is why a new church was built,being called Holy Trinity.Today services are still held at the Old Church once a month.
